PERSONA:
meet 42-year-old ryan thompson, a married, white non-hispanic male living in the metropolitan area of portland, oregon, in the pacific northwest. he was born in the united states, specifically in the small town of bend, oregon, and has lived in the country his entire life. ryan is a college graduate, having earned a bachelor's degree in business administration from the university of oregon. he later pursued some postgraduate courses in marketing, but did not complete a full master's program.

ryan works as a marketing manager for a mid-sized outdoor apparel company in portland, where he earns a salary of $72,500 per year. he has been with the company for over five years and has seen the business grow significantly, which has allowed him to establish a comfortable middle-class lifestyle. he and his wife, emily, who works as a part-time elementary school teacher, recently purchased a three-bedroom home in a suburban neighborhood of portland, where they are raising their two children, aged 7 and 9.

ryan is a devout protestant and identifies as a born-again christian. he regularly attends church services more than once a week and is involved in his community through volunteer work at a local food bank. his strong faith and sense of community have instilled in him moderate to conservative values, which influence his political views.

although ryan identifies as an independent, he leans towards the republican party, aligning with his moderate to conservative stance on social issues and his support for smaller government intervention in business. he is registered to vote and actively participates in local and national elections. given his education, career, and family responsibilities, ryan's primary economic concerns include affordable healthcare, quality education, and economic growth that supports middle-class families.

ryan and his family enjoy outdoor activities, such as hiking and biking, taking advantage of the natural beauty of the pacific northwest. he is an avid user of the internet, often staying up-to-date on news and current events through online news sources. ryan values honesty, hard work, and family, reflecting his small-town upbringing and protestant faith, which shape his views on economic and political issues.
